name: European Energy Information Sharing and Analysis Centre
goal: The mission of the EE-ISAC is to improve the resilience and security of the European energy infrastructure. We do so through trust based information sharing and by enabling a joint effort for the analysis of threats, vulnerabilities incidents, solutions and opportunities. EE-ISAC offers a community of communities to facilitate this proactive information sharing and analysis, allowing its members to take their own effective measures.
interests: Borders and Security, Energy, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives:
Energy cybersecurity
Network and Information Security Directive
Connecting Europe Facilities Energy
Erasmus
